content.question: Let f be the function given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>|</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>|</mo> </mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGMbWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqp daWcaaWdaeaapeWaaqWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLhWUaayjcSdGaeyOeI0 IaaGOmaaWdaeaapeGaamiEaiabgkHiTiaaikdaaaaaaa@4368@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>. (a) Find all the zeros of f.
